response:
Right-sided spastic hemiparesis with brisk reflexes and Babinski, plus right limb intention tremor/ataxia, together with ipsilateral (left) complete 3rd-nerve palsy with mydriasis indicates a crossed brainstem syndrome (Weber/Benedikt overlap) localising to a single left paramedian midbrain lesion involving the oculomotor fascicles, red nucleus/superior cerebellar peduncle and adjacent cerebral peduncle.

lesion_locations = ["left midbrain"]
